name: Chow Mein Noodle Casserole
author: Cindy B :)
summary: This is a very tasty dish that even my kids love! It can easily be cut in half. It uses soy sauce and chow mein noodles to give it an Asian flair.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the ground beef for 5 minutes
Add the onion and celery and saute for 5 more minutes
In a separate medium bowl, combine the almonds, rice, soup, water and soy sauce
Mix together well and add to the beef mixture
Place this into a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 20 minutes
